Description.Name: Beagle Active Probe
Description.Details:
The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry.

The probe was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony as a prototype in 2560 and then as a 'finished product' in 2576 as a means of combating active camouflage and other electronic jamming systems which had become prolific by the end of the Age of War

Description.Name: ACTIVE PROBE PING
Description.Details: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
